label: 灌仏
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: A statue of the Buddha as a baby that figured in the Lustration Rite (Kanbutsu-e) held on the 8th day of the 4th month to honour the Buddha’s birthday.  The rite involved lustrating (pouring water or sweet tea) over the statue.[灌仏会][RK]
